H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3658.def: = musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing

H8269.def: = someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H4853.def: literally: lifting up (one's) self; hence: = action by which humans turn to (other) humans with the confidence that they will find joy and comfort there

H3256.def: = action by which humans or deities respond to negative behavior of (other) humans by administering some sort of punishment, which may range from a verbal rebuke to physical correction, ► often done with corrective intent, but sometimes also as retribution

H995.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H7778.def: = a person responsible for guarding the entrance of a town or building

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H3146.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ahilud<SDBH:אֲחִילוּד>}; ► recorder; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H5417.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zuar<SDBH:צוּעָר>}; tribe of {L:Issachar<SDBH:יִשָּׂשכָר>}; ► chief, time of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}

H6022.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Elkanah<SDBH:אֶלְקָנָה>}; ► ancestor of {L:Heman<SDBH:הֵימָן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H2689.def: = tubular or conical wind instrument with flared mouth and bright penetrating ringing tone; ◄ made out of metal; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H5654.def: = man; ◄ from {L:Gath<SDBH:גַּת>}; ► who kept the {L:ark<SDBH:אֲרֹון>} of the {L:covenant<SDBH:בְּרִית>} stored in his house after the death of {L:Uzzah<SDBH:עֻזָּה>}

H3174.def: = man; ► gatekeeper for the {L:ark<SDBH:אֲרֹון>}; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H7778.def: = a person responsible for guarding the entrance of a town or building

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H8269.def: = someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H8057.def: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H1285.def: = a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H5654.def: = man; ◄ from {L:Gath<SDBH:גַּת>}; ► who kept the {L:ark<SDBH:אֲרֹון>} of the {L:covenant<SDBH:בְּרִית>} stored in his house after the death of {L:Uzzah<SDBH:עֻזָּה>}

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5826.def: = process by which humans receive assistance or supported from other humans or deities

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H1285.def: = a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H2076.def: = causative action by which humans kill one or more animals, usually for food

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H6499.def: = young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such

H352.def: = male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat-tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership

H3736.def: = state in which humans wear a certain type of clothing

H4598.def: = long garment, hanging down to the ankles, ◄ usually made of wool, ► and worn over the {L:tunic<SDBH:כֻּתֹּנֶת>}; it is not clear whether it had sleeves or not, nor whether it was open or closed in the front; ≈ certain attitudes and emotions are often described in terms of such a garment, e.g. "he wore fury like a robe"

H948.def: = high quality woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of cloth and clothes; worn by the rich and by priests and Levites; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H7891.def: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H3663.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► chief of Levites during time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H8269.def: = someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

H4853.def: literally: lifting up (one's) self; hence: = action by which humans turn to (other) humans with the confidence that they will find joy and comfort there

H906.def: = woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of clothes; worn by priests and supernatural beings; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness

H646.def: = garment; reaching from the shoulders to the waist; ◄ made from linen; ► normally worn by {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}, but also by {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} when the ark was brought to Jerusalem

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H1285.def: = a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H8643.def: = loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community

H7782.def: = a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations

H2689.def: = tubular or conical wind instrument with flared mouth and bright penetrating ringing tone; ◄ made out of metal; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations

H4700.def: = paired round thin metal plate-like objects ► struck together to produce a loud crashing sound as part of musical accompaniment

H5035.def: = container ◄ made of a goatskin, the outer side of which has been turned inside; ► used for storing wine

H3658.def: = musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing

H727.def: = relatively large wooden box ► used for storage

H1285.def: = a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H7586.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kish<SDBH:קִישׁ>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H4324.def: = woman; ◄ daughter of king {L:Saul<SDBH:שָׁאוּל>}, younger sister of {L:Merab<SDBH:מֵרַב>}; ► wife of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H1157.def: = path through which a certain entity can be accessed, which can vary from a relatively narrow opening on one side to the entire surrounding space

H2474.def: = an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed; sometimes used as secret entrance or exit; ≈ has therefore some connonations of secrecy

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H7540.def: = action with which humans or animals move in a quick and light or lively way

H7832.def: = action by which humans give expression to a friendly attitude, joy and amusement with the gestures and sounds that normally accompany it; ≈ this is normally regarded as a good thing, especially when done with restraint, whereas a lack of restraint is often associated with foolishness

H959.def: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
